TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableRow extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 表示 控件中的 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents the HTML element in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素表示表中的行。The `` element represents a row in a table. 使用 类以编程方式控制 `` 控件中的 HTML 元素 。Use the class to programmatically control the `` HTML elements in an control. 通过使用类，您可以通过指定行中单元格的背景色、边框颜色和高度自定义表中行的外观。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a row in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, and the height of the cells in the row. 这些属性使用 、 和属性进行设置 。These attributes are set using the , , and properties. 您可以使用和属性控制整行的单元格内容的对齐方式 。You can control the alignment of the contents in the cells for the entire row by using the and properties. 属性控制单元内容的水平对齐方式，而属性则控制 垂直对齐方式。The property controls the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 通过使用 此类的集合，您可以以编程方式访问表的行中的单个单元格。By using the collection of this class, you can programmatically access the individual cells in a row of a table. 这允许您控制每个单元的属性以及内容。This allows you to control the properties of each cell, as well as the content. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 实例表示控件中的行 。The following code example demonstrates how to use an instance to represent a row in the control. 从表的集合检索 ，并修改其内容。An is retrieved from the collection of the table and its contents are modified. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数用于创建一个 对象，该对象表示 `` 表行的元素。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table row. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Tr" 文本字符串。The "tr" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建控件的实例 ，并将表放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中某一行的单元格内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控件中某一行的单元格内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件中某一行的单元格内容的水平对齐方式 。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响由类的实例表示的表行中的所有单元格 。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要将对齐属性应用于一行的单个单元，请设置 该单元格的属性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|将单元格的内容与单元格的左边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of the cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|将单元格的内容在单元格中居中对齐。Aligns the contents of the cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|将单元格的内容与单元格的右边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of the cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用 `Justify` 和 `Char` 作为此属性的值。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持这些功能。However, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性控制整行中单元格内容的水平对齐方式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的行的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的行的背景色。

span.span: The background color of the row represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的行的背景色 。Use the property to specify the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制控件中行的背景色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the background color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的行的边框颜色。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的行的边框颜色 。Use the property to specify the border color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制控件中行的边框颜色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the border color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示在 控件的某一行中包含的单元格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells contained in a row of the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中某一行中的单元格。

span.span: An that contains the cells of a row in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用该 集合以编程方式访问控件中某一行的单元格 。Use the collection to programmatically access the cells of a row in an control. 您可以通过编程方式在集合中添加、删除和插入单元。You can programmatically add, remove, and insert cells in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果行中没有定义单元， 则返回空对象。If there are no cells defined in a row, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合来循环访问由对象表示的行的单元格 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to iterate through the cells of a row, represented by an object. 然后，将用新内容更新单元。The cells are then updated with new content. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格的高度 (（以像素为单位）) 。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。All cells in the row share the same height. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的高度小于在表的行中显示单元格的内容，则将忽略此属性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cells in the row of a table, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来控制控件中行的高度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of a row in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在调用基类的方法之前和之后提供其他格式设置 。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 附加格式设置使 控件的呈现的 HTML 更易于阅读，方法是在呈现 控件的子对象之前添加行返回和缩进。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child objects. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在调用基类的方法之后提供其他格式设置 。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 添加的格式设置使 控件的呈现的 HTML 更易于读取，方法是在结束标记后添加一个行返回 `` 。The added formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing `` tag. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中某一行的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控件中某一行的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件中某一行的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式 。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响由类的实例表示的表行中的所有单元格 。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要将对齐属性应用于一行的单个单元，请设置 该单元格的属性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|将单元格的内容与单元格的上边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|将单元格的内容与单元格的中心对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|将单元格的内容与单元格的下边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用 `BaseLine` 作为此属性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制整行中单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]
